name: LI Bo
meta_data: personal background, education background, research interest, lab
content:
H1: Bo Li's Homepage
• Assistant ProfessorDepartment of ComputingThe Hong Kong Polytechnic UniversityHung Hom, Kowloon, Hong KongOffice:PQ 834, Mong Man Wai BuildingTel:(852) 2766 7255Email:comp-bo.li@polyu.edu.hk



H2: Short Bio
Before joining Comp@PolyU, I was a Postdoctoral Fellow in the Department of Computer Science at University of Oxford and in the Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering at University of Texas at Austin.



I received my PhD from the Department of Computer Science at Stony Brook University, and B.S. in Applied Maths and M.S. in Operations Research at Ocean University of China.



H2: Research Interests
• Algorithmic Game Theory and Mechanism Design
• Computational Social Choice and Fair Division
• Approximation and Online Algorithms



H2: Group Members
H3: Current Members
• Ankang Sun (Postdoc, BSc from SDU, PhD from Warwick)

name: LI Bo
content:
H2: Recent Publications (dblp)
• Fair Division of Indivisible Goods: Recent Progress and Open Questions.
					Georgios Amanatidis, Haris Aziz, Georgios Birmpas, Aris Filos-Ratsikas, Bo Li, Hervé Moulin, Alexandros A. Voudouris and Xiaowei Wu,Artificial Intelligence, 2023.
• Your College Dorm and Dormmates: Fair Resource Sharing with Externailties.
					Jiarui Gan, Bo Li and Yingkai Li,Journal of Artificial Intelligence Research, 2023.
• Maximal Information Propagation via Lotteries. 
					Jing Chen and Bo Li,Blockchain, 2023.
• Well-behaved Online Load Balancing Against Strategic Jobs. 
					Bo Li, Minming Li and Xiaowei Wu,Journal of Scheduling, 2022.
• Approximate and Strategyproof Maximin Share Allocation of Chores with Ordinal Preferences.
					Haris Aziz, Bo Li and Xiaowei Wu,Mathematical Programming, 2022.
• Bayesian Auctions with Efficient Queries.
					Jing Chen, Bo Li, Yingkai Li and Pinyan Lu,Artificial Intelligence, 2022.
